title: PSA: Kleds E
body:
Kleds E, Jousting when it hits an enemy champion it marks then allowing him to recast and dash back through them. 

**DO NOT FLASH WHEN YOURE MARKED**

It acts like a thresh hook, it has a fairly long range, it will go over walls, {{champion:240}}  don't care.... the second cast of his E will reach you unless he's dead or CC'd

Thank you everyone
-Mistress Shyvava

replies.body: While generally good advice (don't flash while marked!), Kled and Skaarl can't complete the second dash of Jousting if you're over like 700 range away. So the global bit is overstated. It has some bounds. But Flash alone is not likely to get a champion out of the range.  Also if you do go beyond that tether range, the mark will disappear so your main statement remains really good advice. :)
Also how many Teemo's is 700 units?

700...  Teemos are the only unit of measurement.  

More seriously, about 7? It's a bit shorter than his bear trap on a rope range.

AHH thanks
